function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on global commodity chains with low cost, just-in-time inventory, and specialized divisions of labor","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contaminated water sources provide breeding grounds for disease-carrying mosquitoes, increasing the risk of malaria and dengue transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pollution, including particulate matter and other pollutants, has been linked to increased severity and transmission of covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity in factoring natural birth and death rates of a population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity in factoring spatial movement of populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compartmentalization complexity in epidemic models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Superspreading events leading to majority transmission of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High population density facilitating disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdowns reducing community transmission but halting economic activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequalities exacerbating the disease burden for vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrastructure inequities enhance host susceptibility and can facilitate transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited contact tracing and isolation may lead to unchecked virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population susceptibility to infection is influenced by biological traits and environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunding of global surveillance of viruses capable of transmission to humans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Habitat encroachment and fragmentation leading to increased wildlife-urban interfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoonotic diseases originating from wildlife and domestic animals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding and mutation due to human disturbances to habitats and animal hosts","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of familiarity with campus buildings and keys may lead to increased contact and exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive interaction with students may result in missed opportunities to identify and address health concerns or symptoms of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to act as representatives of the university may lead to missed opportunities to enforce health and safety measures and educate the campus community on disease prevention.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in classrooms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared patrol car assignments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation for air distribution","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient air distribution leading to temperature variations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate prediction of infection probability in confined spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on assumptions about droplet behavior and size","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited consideration of evaporation effects on infection probability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of other significant paths of virus transmission, such as direct contact and droplet nuclei.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypothesized initial infection probability may lead to deviation of projected infection probability and minimum ventilation rate.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypothesized social distance may not reflect practical conditions, especially in spaces with strong population mobility or irregular shapes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of virus spreading by droplets of different sizes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited number of real cases used for model calibration","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sensitivity studies show reduced infection risk with occupancy rate reduction and social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low ventilation rates in indoor spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing distances","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation rate leading to high infection risk","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing impacting required ventilation rate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard-required minimum fresh air flow rate inadequate for risk mitigation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linear increase in infection risk with exposure time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection probability in high-density occupancy areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in infection probability with occupancy ratio and exposure time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain range of projected infection due to exposure time and location.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncalibrated infective quantum q in the modified model based on limited data from a single representative case","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of the distance between passengers on the bus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncalculated or misestimated ventilation rate on the bus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate q values for specific respiratory infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation of q value in different spaces with different population densities and ventilation systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider factors other than ventilation rate in the wells-riley model","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
